Subject: trying to restart the base

X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103

  ::Famine:: He worked quickly trying to restart the computers. He hoped this 
would work. He rerouted some of the power in the shields to the computers. It 
had been at least two hours since they went off. He had found a dozen of 
Phobia's babies with hisown short range scanners that is why the computers 
had still not been restarted. He had destroyed them and saw that they where 
all in some type of stasis. This proving that they where in some way damaged 
by the pulse but not destroyed. He turned and saw all the comps come online. 
.."Computer make scan of all internal systems and seek them out and destroy 
all of them. Modify for any possible cloaking of shield modification." He 
smilied at his work and sat back for a well deserved rest.
